summary: README instructions fail because @temporalio/create package hasn't been published to npm yet. User encounters 404 error when trying to initialize a new project and requests documentation on how the package aliases are configured.
userImpact: Users cannot follow the README instructions to get started with the SDK, creating a barrier to entry for new developers.
rootCause: @temporalio/create package not yet published to npm registry
proposedFix: Publish @temporalio/create to npm and document the package structure and aliases in the README
resolutionDetails: Package was subsequently published to npm and documentation was updated
keyQuote: This is because we haven't published anything to `npm` yet. I'll do that soon. I agree we should document the different packages in this repo.
